name: Limitless Notion Template - Crypto Tracker
description: Minimal template to track all your Cryptos in one place. Shows how much you invested, its current value and your net returns as stats. Features: ✅ Simple tracker to manage your crypto in one place✅ Add your orders to track history and notes for your buy/sell decisions✅ View current holdings per crypto after you enter buy/sell orders✅ Get stats of your total invested and returns✅ Add new crypto that you want to track easilyP.S. You will have to enter the last price manually for the crypto you are
